item.description:
Hi there,
moving the time up for this to 6:30 sign in...give more people time to get there.
and cancelling the second group, too many late cancellations, so not enough people.

I thought I would let you know of my new venture, in case you're single and would like to try "suzie's speed dating" or "fun events by suz"...someone help me with the name please

My first party was in Dracut, MA last month, and was very successful, with over 50 people attending.

If you'd like to spin the wheel of fate, and maybe find your sweetie, I am having a second party in Nashua, NH at the "Sky Lounge" restaurant and pub, on Thursday, August 26th. The Sky Lounge is a real classy, big "open air/concept" place at 522 Amherst Street, even though from the street, it looks like a small bar. It's in the same plaza as Gold's Gym.
The owners/managers let me use the entire upstairs lounge for the party :)

They have a good menu you can check it out at SkyLoungeNH.com, and of course there's a cash bar.


Here is the schedule:
46-58 years group starts at 6:00pm (filled for women...sorry gals) lots of new gals, guys :)

you must email me or call for confirmation, and pay at the door, at this point. I'm pretty full right now.
Please include in any correspondence the following information:
Age/category you'd like to be included in, and your Name, Address, Phone and Email address.

If anyone is interested in a 55+ group please let me know, I will get a list together.

Hope to see you again soon...you may even want to come back again :) or find yourself a good Realtor, in the mean time :)


truly,

Susan J. Tisbert
PO BOX 793
Pelham, NH 03076

RE/MAX Platinum Realty
item.how_to_find_us: we'll be in the upstairs loungs

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: suzie's speed dating # 2
